patthana8.47:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana8.47:0.3_0: someone should apply themselves to a ball of food.
patthana8.47:1.1_0: One with an external thought doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
patthana8.47:2.1_0: One with an external thought doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
patthana8.47:2.1_1: One with an external thought doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
patthana8.47:2.1_2: nor with an external thought, nor with internal distrusterity.
patthana8.47:3.1_0: nor with an external physical body, nor with the preoccupation of mind.
patthana8.47:4.1_0: For the sake of what is the reason for two reasons ...
patthana8.47:4.1_3: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
patthana8.47:5.1_0: The vast permutation series is finished.
